title: MASTERY 6
body:
Dear riot,
I just ended a game of urf and i got an S with morgana but it didnt give me a token to get lvl 6. Why did that happen?

replies.body: Mastery Tokens only drop from getting those S mastery scores in normal or ranked SR matches I believe, so you'll need to be getting S's in those game modes to get tokens.
You have to play normal or ranked Summoner's Rift for mastery tokens, so URF games won't count.
